name: XML Based DBMS Engine
short_description: This is a DBMS which uses XML as Database Storage. Its simple yet powerful. Can export/Import Databases to/from Other Database Systems or Files (XML/SQL/Text). It have a limited SQL execution capability with few commands of its own.
